reference.title: memset : set an area of memory

section.title: Synopsis
section.codeblock: #include <string.h> void *memset(const void *dst, int c, size_t length);

section.title: Description
section.p: This function converts the argument c into an unsigned char and fills the first length characters of the array pointed to by dst to the value.

section.title: Returns
section.p: memset returns the value of m.
